label: Weekly
description: Items are restocked once a week.

label: Bi-Weekly
description: Items are restocked every two weeks.

label: Monthly
description: Items are restocked once a month.

label: Quarterly
description: Items are restocked once every three months.

label: Bi-Annually
description: Items are restocked twice a year.

label: Annually
description: Items are restocked once a year.

label: On Demand
description: Items are restocked whenever the stock falls below a threshold.

label: Seasonal
description: Items are restocked during specific seasons based on demand.

label: Never
description: Items are not restocked, typically used for one-time purchases.
